review.title: Synergy of all-purpose static solver and temporal reasoning tools in dynamic integrated expert systems
review.abstract: The paper discusses scientific and technological problems of dynamic integrated expert systems development. Extensions of problem-oriented methodology for dynamic integrated expert systems development are considered. Attention is paid to the temporal knowledge representation and processing.

sections.heading: SYNERGY OF ALL-PURPOSE STATIC SOLVER AND TEMPORAL REASONING
sections.text: TOOLS IN DYNAMIC INTEGATED EXPERT SYSTEMS Galina V. Rybina (galina @ ailab.mephi.ru) Alexey V. Mozgachev (avmozgachev @ mephi.ru) Dmitry V. Demidov (dvdemidov @ mephi.ru) National Research Nuclear University MEPhI (Moscow Engineering Physics Institute) Kashirskoye shosse 31, Moscow, 115409, Russian Federation The paper discusses scientific and technological problems of dynamic development of integrated expert systems. Extensions of problem-oriented methodology for dynamic integrated expert systems are considered.

sections.heading: INTRODUCTION
sections.text: In fact, the impact of the use of intelligent systems on the availability of software tools and their application in strategically important areas is very high, leading to intensive research and software development in areas such as dynamic integrated expert systems, intelligent agents, multi-agent systems and libraries that support the dynamic implementation of dynamic systems. Despite the lack of semantically uniform terms and the classification of dynamic systems, the scope of scientific and technological problems that require a comprehensive application of dynamic systems is already defined.

sections.text: In fact, most of them are able to determine for themselves how to act.

sections.heading: CONCLUSION
sections.text: Recent experiments have shown some advantages of the developed software over competitors based on the following criteria: SVL performance, speed, dynamic integrated ES design time. Several prototypes of dynamically integrated ES of great practical importance are under construction.
